website_summaries.verdict: These lightweight, unisex frames feature extra-flexible hinges that can stretch to fit almost any face.
pros: UV400 protection and scratch resistant coating
Comes with storage case and microfiber pouch
cons: The screws can get too loose, so be sure to check them from time to time

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product!
customer_reviews.text: OK. So a co-worker was looking at these, and decided to go with a cheaper pair. I wasn't that impressed. But once his arrived, I loved the look, but wanted the specific Pink/Wood combination, and the company he went with didn't offer this pairing. Sooooooo, I ended up back on Tree Tribe's sellers page. I absolutely LOVE these glasses. They are bright, lightweight, beautifully textured. Just a really unique and separate way to stylize your look. Unfortunately it has been quite overcast the last week or so, but you know what....I am wearing my shades anyway because they look great on. Thanks for your hard work guys, and thanks for planting those trees too!
customer_reviews.author: B. R. Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Light & lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Love these & so do many others too as i get compliments all the time! Not only are these very cool but they are comfy & clear! Not cumbersome in any way -- simply light & lovely! Super case & great service too. Win win with my rose colored glasses!
customer_reviews.author: I. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly light and such a comfortable fit on my face
customer_reviews.text: LOVEEEEE these glasses! Just got them in and I'm obsessed already! Incredibly light and such a comfortable fit on my face. The fact that they float just made them my go to pair of shades for pool parties! Glad to hear that my purchase paid it forward as well. I will definitely be purchasing more and can't wait to see any future styles!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: yet feels like I'm not wearing any sun glasses on my face
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shades just in time for summer! The frame is durable, yet feels like I'm not wearing any sun glasses on my face. The polarized lenses make for a strong protection against the sun and also has a great look to them. I also love bamboo products and it feels great that I'm contributing to a cause that's bettering our world. I got the pink shades, and they are the perfect pair to rock at the beach or by the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Miyashiro

customer_reviews.title: ... as a birthday gift for my wife & she loved them. Constantly getting complements
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday gift for my wife & she loved them. Constantly getting complements. Red lenses are especially attractive with the reddish bamboo frame.Light, Float, excellent vision contrast, & price is affordable. Con: Fits large, hopefully we can adjust them.
customer_reviews.author: Louis E. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Glasses You Need In Active Lifestyles!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great. I'm always in the water so their perfect for my lifestyle; I can never lose them since they float. They arrived timely and come with a little black cloth case where you can keep the glasses safely stored. I would recommend them to anybody, especially people with active lifestyles since their durable. I have ruined so many of my everyday glasses while doing activities, so I'm happy to find a pair of glasses that are durable in all weather!
customer_reviews.author: ANG

customer_reviews.title: Best glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses! I bought a pink pair for me and blue pair for my husband and he loves them too!! The moving hinge on them is great!
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Love them except I've had them less than a week ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them except I've had them less than a week and the flex point came loose or didnt hold and now one side flexes outward and they dont stay on my face, hoping they'll exchange them
customer_reviews.author: alyssa sieber

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with my new Tree Tribe sunglasses!! I get so many compliments on them--from guys and girls! I love how the glasses float too! These glasses are perfect for boating. They also plant 10 trees! I love buying cute/practical things where proceeds goes to a great cause!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses! They held up very well since I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Scarpulla

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and fast shipping. Only a bit large for womens face.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Katz L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments when I wear these glasses
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: I love these sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses! I love that they will plant 10 trees for every pair purchased! They are light weight and very comfortable. Another plus is that they will float in water.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glasses. Love the fact that they're polarized/two-toned and ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses. Love the fact that they're polarized/two-toned and have flexible hinges. Really love these glasses, money well spent. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Lochridge

customer_reviews.title: Wow, Very good polarization quality!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!!! Polarization on them is really good quality. I usually don't leave reviews but I felt the need to with these. They look very very cool!!
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Cool look and classic design
customer_reviews.text: Brah, these sunglasses are SICK!!! Cool look and classic design. Light like a feather and I get compliments on them everytime I wear them. My wife wants her own pair too. Looks like I'm getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: They float .... Great for boat I love them .... Well worth the $$$$
customer_reviews.author: sierra bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: This glasses are great. People ask where I got them and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This glasses are great. People ask where I got them and I am more than happy to say Amazon. The lenses are awesome and the feel is great. Would recommend to anyone. I just caught six red salmon while styling in these shades today.
customer_reviews.author: John Boren

customer_reviews.title: Less wood, more like plastic frame
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these sunglasses, but unfortunately, I will be returning them. The wood is not as weighty as I was expecting-- it looked and felt like plastic to me. That said, the shape of the sunglasses was great and the lenses are cool (I got the pink reflective). It's just that the frame itself is not what I am looking for. I wanted something that actually felt and looked like wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I like these glasses very much. However what I most like about them is that they plant 10 trees for every pair of glasses sold.
customer_reviews.text: I like these glasses very much. However what I most like about them is that they plant 10 trees for every pair of glasses sold.
customer_reviews.author: Tre Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you are considering getting these DO IT NOW. They are perfect. They fit a woman's face well and what you see in the photo is exactly what you get. Best sunglasses I've owned, plus they float.
customer_reviews.author: Bananas_Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo Suave
customer_reviews.text: Loving these bamboo sunglasses! they are super comfortable and very stylish. It feels like air when you wear these on your face. I have been getting a lot of compliments while wearing these bad boys on the streets, people stop me to ask where I had bought them. The customer service was top notch as well and I was pleasantly surprised that a human being is at the other end of the conversation, these guys really do care about their product and service means a lot to them. Now that its summer, I will be wearing these a lot more!
customer_reviews.author: Nomadic Gear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came super fast, love them. description was on point! Thanks :)
customer_reviews.author: jk2010

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I may look like a 17 year old kid when I wear these, but I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: She loved this gift and that there will be trees planted when you buy this too...
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Veety

product_meta.title: Tree Tribe Bamboo Sunglasses with Polarized Lens and Floating Frames
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :6.14 x 5.63 x 1.81 inches; 2.08 Ounces
 * Item model number :BSG100
 * Department :Unisex
 * Date First Available :May 1, 2015
 * ASIN :B013AYIXZG

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.3 out of 5 stars35 ratings
feature_bullets: POLARIZED LENSES - Provide crystal clear vision with UV400 protection and a scratch resistant coating. 53mm x 39mm lens.
UNIQUE BAMBOO FRAMES - Crafted with 100% real bamboo frames, so every pair is different. Carbonized frames strengthen the material and enrich the color.
FLOATING SUNGLASSES - Because of the porous nature of bamboo, these sunglasses float in water!

CLASSIC NATURAL STYLE - Classic style looks good on everyone. Flexible hinges can hyper-extend for a comfortable fit. Frame size: 143mm front width x 156mm length x 46mm height (5.6" x 6.1" x 1.7"). Bridge 18mm (Distance from inner lens to inner lens)
WE PLANT TREES - Tree Tribe is an nature inspired outdoor lifestyle brand that gives back by planting trees.
